name: Space Pig Ceramics
description:
Simple Shooter full made with ceramics, hundreds of piggy banks i made from clay for my ceramic instalations "SainoMore", this time all the piggies are spaceships on war against yours, shoot and shot, get upgrades, break all  the pottery on the way

All sounds comes from the same piggy banks

From Clay to pixels

All ceramics made between 2004/2009

Space Pig Ceramic was an old game i made back in 2010, it was unfinish until today, 3 new levels with the same old ceramics i made from my series "SainoMore"

Check in game some of the "Saino More" instalations

you can play the html 5 game version in browser  or download an .exe for your PC
